{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$2.1M in 2021-2022 on contracts with LRO STAFFING.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [LRO Staffing](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22LRO%20Staffing%22)
- [LRO STAFFING](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22LRO%20STAFFING%22)
- [LRO Staffing Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22LRO%20Staffing%20Inc.%22)
{{< /details >}}
